sentences.english: I think my brother has finally kicked the gambling habit.
sentences.chinese: 我想我哥哥算是绝对改掉牌赌的恶习啦。

sentences.english: In the intimate circle of Friendlies, Huanhuan is the big brother.
sentences.chinese: 在体内循环的友谊赛，欢欢是大哥哥。

sentences.english: My elder brother and I loaded the handcart with wheat and pulled it home.
sentences.chinese: 我和哥哥用架子车装了一车麦子拉回家。

sentences.english: What makes my brother think he's so smart?
sentences.chinese: 我哥哥凭什么认为自己是那么聪明？

sentences.english: Yesterday my brother and I went to catch crabs again.
sentences.chinese: 昨天我又和哥哥一起去捉螃蟹了。

sentences.english: At midnight my brother and nephew went to get fuel.
sentences.chinese: 大半夜里，我哥哥和外甥去弄燃油。

sentences.english: A book was given to her as a birthday present.
sentences.chinese: 她哥哥送给她一本书作为生日礼品。

sentences.english: She could have thought of nothing more likely to please her brother than this praise of Maggie.
sentences.chinese: 她本该想到没有比赞扬玛琪更能使她哥哥高兴的了。

sentences.english: The female cub is waiting aside and see if her brothers have made any progress.
sentences.chinese: 小雌虎则在一旁等待哥哥们有没有进展。

sentences.english: I thought it was my brother. But instead, it was two police officers.
sentences.chinese: 我原以为会是我的哥哥，但取而代之地却是两个警察。

sentences.english: He said to his brothers, "Listen to this dream I had."
sentences.chinese: 为了这个梦，约瑟的哥哥们恨透了他。

sentences.english: Correia has watched her brother spend half his life in prison.
sentences.chinese: 科雷亚已经看了她的哥哥花一半他终身监禁。

sentences.english: I can't believe your brother is a lawyer.
sentences.chinese: 我真不敢相信你的哥哥是一个律师。

sentences.english: His brother is a disturber of the piano keys .
sentences.chinese: 他哥哥是一个跟钢琴找麻烦的人。

sentences.english: This is Emile, my brother. He’s easily impressed.
sentences.chinese: 他是我哥哥埃米尔，他很容易引人注目。

sentences.english: A second, then a third brother jumped to their rescue below. Their ten-year-old brother was the last one left at that upstairs window.
sentences.chinese: 他们10岁的哥哥是最后一个留在楼上窗户旁的人。

definition: father's younger brother/uncle/Taiwan pr. [shu2 shu5]/CL:個|个[ge4]
older male cousin via female line
younger male cousin via female line
eldest brother/big brother (polite address for a man of about the same age as oneself)/gang leader/boss
brothers/younger brother/CL:個|个[ge4]/I, me (humble term used by men in public speech)/brotherly/fraternal
